text: Mister Johnson is a 1990 American drama movie directed by Bruce Beresford and was based on the 1939 novel of the same name by Joyce Cary. It stars Pierce Brosnan, Edward Woodward, Nick Reding, Andrew Lancel, Maynard Eziashi, Beatie Edney, Denis Quilley and Hubert Ogunde. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1990 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in Nigeria
title: Mister Johnson (movie)
